snippet: Meeting in Washington this week, an alliance of liberal philanthropists is laying plans for what it hopes will be a long-term resurgence of progressive ideas.
abstract: Democracy Alliance, nation's leading group of liberal philanthropists and political donors, seems to be shrugging off defeat of Democrats in midterm elections and is planning for long-term resurgence of progressive ideas; in sign of how passions of large donors have come to define landscape of issues in national elections, alliance members are poised to expand funding to fight for climate-change measures and restrictions on money in politics.
lead_paragraph: Meeting in Washington this week, an alliance of liberal philanthropists is laying plans for what it hopes will be a long-term resurgence of progressive ideas.
